anathema: rest when there is lawlessness to fight, believe you know or understand more than the pantheon
edict: eliminate chaos at its root, be an exemplar of order (worthy of not one, but five), seek the universal laws that transcend individual faiths
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=198)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The Godclaw grants [feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112) in place of _dominate_._

The Hellknight Order of the Godclaw reveres a pantheon of five deities: [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=9) and [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18) are seen as Hellknights (concerned with offensive and defensive combat, respectively), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=10) as the epitome of emotionless discipline, [Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=1) as a keeper of laws, and [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=2) as a strategist king. Depictions of these deities as part of the Godclaw differ from traditional images, with the deities portrayed as stern, armored paragons of law. Though some members of the Order of the Godclaw dedicate themselves to individual gods, many take the whole pantheon as their patron, receiving spells despite their unorthodox (perhaps even heretical) beliefs.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Pantheons](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=18)

**Edicts** eliminate chaos at its root, be an exemplar of order (worthy of not one, but five), seek the universal laws that transcend individual faiths

**Anathema** rest when there is lawlessness to fight, believe you know or understand more than the pantheon

**Area of Concern**
discipline, laws, order, strategy

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, LE

**Pantheon Members**
[Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=1), [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=2), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=9), [Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=10), [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

**Favored Weapon** [Morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)

**Domains** [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=26), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=33), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220)

- **4th**
[Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118)

- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)

</column>
name: The Godclaw
